title: Awesome List Updates on Apr 26, 2022
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on Apr 26, 2022 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome Falsehood
items.content_text:
### Dates and Time

*   [The Long, Painful History of Time](http://naggum.no/lugm-time.html) - Most of the idiosyncrasies in timekeeping can find an explanation in history.
*   [How to choose between UT1, TAI and UTC](https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=28047376) - Depends on your priorities between SI seconds, earth rotation sync, leap seconds avoidance.
*   [Critical and Significant Dates](https://web.archive.org/web/20150908004245/http://www.merlyn.demon.co.uk/critdate.htm) - From Y2K to the overflow of 32-bit seconds from Unix epoch, a list of special date to watch for depending on the system.

### Software Engineering

*   [Rules for Autocomplete](http://jeremymikkola.com/posts/2019_03_19_rules_for_autocomplete.html) - Not falsehoods *per se*, but still a great list of good practices to implement autocompletion.
items.content_html:
Dates and Time

  • The Long, Painful History of Time - Most of the idiosyncrasies in timekeeping can find an explanation in history.
  • How to choose between UT1, TAI and UTC - Depends on your priorities between SI seconds, earth rotation sync, leap seconds avoidance.
  • Critical and Significant Dates - From Y2K to the overflow of 32-bit seconds from Unix epoch, a list of special date to watch for depending on the system.

Software Engineering

  • Rules for Autocomplete - Not falsehoods per se, but still a great list of good practices to implement autocompletion.

items.title: Awesome Eosio
items.content_text:
### YouTube Channels / Services

*   [EOS Nation](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCXgAY9DyooykrubRXw3xK1g) - EOS Hot Sauce, ENF, tech, and community content.
*   [Helios](https://www.youtube.com/c/HeliosEOSIO) - Dedicated to growing EOS, interviews and spotlights.
items.content_html:

  • Helios - Dedicated to growing EOS, interviews and spotlights.

items.title: Awesome Deno
items.content_text:
### Modules / Utils

*   [fastest-validator (‚≠ê1.4k)](https://github.com/icebob/fastest-validator) - Schema validator for all javascript platforms
*   [unified-deno-lock (‚≠ê1)](https://github.com/yooneskh/unified-deno-lock) - Powerful and simple lock (mutex) library to handle race conditions with zero dependencies

### Resources in Other Languages / Darija

items.title: Awesome Zsh Plugins
items.content_text:
### Plugins / [superconsole](https://github.com/alexchmykhalo/superconsole) - Windows-only

*   [zshange\_directory\_recent (‚≠ê0)](https://github.com/Kjeldgaard/zshange_directory_recent) - Change to a recent directory. Requires [fzf (‚≠ê72k)](https://github.com/junegunn/fzf).

### Completions / [superconsole](https://github.com/alexchmykhalo/superconsole) - Windows-only

*   [npm-scripts-autocomplete (‚≠ê104)](https://github.com/grigorii-zander/zsh-npm-scripts-autocomplete) - Shows autocomplete suggestions from scripts found in the current directory's `package.json`. Works with `npm` and `yarn`.

### Themes / [superconsole](https://github.com/alexchmykhalo/superconsole) - Windows-only

*   [daily-emoji (‚≠ê1)](https://github.com/huytran-wq/zsh-daily-emoji-theme/) - Shows random emoji at the beginning of each command depending on the day of the week.
items.content_html:
Plugins / superconsole - Windows-only

  • zshange_directory_recent (‚≠ê0) - Change to a recent directory. Requires fzf (‚≠ê72k).

Completions / superconsole - Windows-only

  • npm-scripts-autocomplete (‚≠ê104) - Shows autocomplete suggestions from scripts found in the current directory's package.json. Works with npm and yarn.

Themes / superconsole - Windows-only

  • daily-emoji (‚≠ê1) - Shows random emoji at the beginning of each command depending on the day of the week.

items.title: Awesome Go
items.content_text:
### Configuration

*   [GoLobby/Config (‚≠ê365)](https://github.com/golobby/config) - GoLobby Config is a lightweight yet powerful configuration manager for the Go programming language.
*   [nfigure (‚≠ê8)](https://github.com/muir/nfigure) - Per-library struct-tag based configuration from command lines (Posix & Go-style); environment, JSON, YAML

### Miscellaneous Data Structures and Algorithms

*   [slices (‚≠ê22)](https://github.com/twharmon/slices) - Pure, generic functions for slices.

### Functional

*   [fp-go (‚≠ê316)](https://github.com/repeale/fp-go) - Collection of Functional Programming helpers powered by Golang 1.18+ generics.

### Dependency Injection

*   [GoLobby/Container (‚≠ê596)](https://github.com/golobby/container) - GoLobby Container is a lightweight yet powerful IoC dependency injection container for the Go programming language.

### Morphological Analyzers

*   [govader-backend (‚≠ê6)](https://github.com/PIMPfiction/govader_backend) - Microservice implementation of [GoVader (‚≠ê50)](https://github.com/jonreiter/govader).

### ORM

*   [golobby/orm (‚≠ê160)](https://github.com/golobby/orm) - Simple, fast, type-safe, generic orm for developer happiness.

### Query Language

*   [goven (‚≠ê61)](https://github.com/SeldonIO/goven) - A drop-in query language for any database schema.

### Third-party APIs

*   [fasapay-sdk-go (‚≠ê2)](https://github.com/Kachit/fasapay-sdk-go) - Unofficial Fasapay payment gateway XML API Client for Golang.

### Web Frameworks

*   [golamb (‚≠ê7)](https://github.com/twharmon/golamb) - Golamb makes it easier to write API endpoints for use with AWS Lambda and API Gateway.

### Routers / Libraries for creating HTTP middlewares

*   [GoLobby/Router (‚≠ê22)](https://github.com/golobby/router) - GoLobby Router is a lightweight yet powerful HTTP router for the Go programming language.

### DevOps Tools / Libraries for creating HTTP middlewares

*   [go-rocket-update (‚≠ê107)](https://github.com/mouuff/go-rocket-update) - A simple way to make self updating Go applications - Supports Github and Gitlab.
items.content_html:

  • nfigure (‚≠ê8) - Per-library struct-tag based configuration from command lines (Posix & Go-style); environment, JSON, YAML

  • GoLobby/Container (‚≠ê596) - GoLobby Container is a lightweight yet powerful IoC dependency injection container for the Go programming language.

Morphological Analyzers

  • govader-backend (‚≠ê6) - Microservice implementation of GoVader (‚≠ê50).

ORM

  • golobby/orm (‚≠ê160) - Simple, fast, type-safe, generic orm for developer happiness.

Query Language

  • goven (‚≠ê61) - A drop-in query language for any database schema.

Third-party APIs

  • fasapay-sdk-go (‚≠ê2) - Unofficial Fasapay payment gateway XML API Client for Golang.

Web Frameworks

  • golamb (‚≠ê7) - Golamb makes it easier to write API endpoints for use with AWS Lambda and API Gateway.

Routers / Libraries for creating HTTP middlewares

  • GoLobby/Router (‚≠ê22) - GoLobby Router is a lightweight yet powerful HTTP router for the Go programming language.

DevOps Tools / Libraries for creating HTTP middlewares

items.title: Awesome Graphql
items.content_text:
### Tools - Miscellaneous / React

*   [Blendbase (‚≠ê25)](https://github.com/blendbase/blendbase): Single open-source GraphQL API to connect CRMs to your SaaS. Query any customer CRM system (Salesforce, Hubspot and more) with a single API query from your SaaS app.
items.content_html:
Tools - Miscellaneous / React

  • Blendbase (‚≠ê25): Single open-source GraphQL API to connect CRMs to your SaaS. Query any customer CRM system (Salesforce, Hubspot and more) with a single API query from your SaaS app.
